description: It holds several health promoting neuro-active substances, anti-oxidants, minerals, and vitamins.
Relieves menstrual problems,treats hypertension,helps in weight reduction,improves digestion.
Ginseng contains various pharmacological components, including a series of tetracyclic triterpenoid saponins (ginsenosides), polyacetylenes, polyphenolic compounds and acidic polysaccharides.
